sentence: Preheat the oven to 425°F 🔥
Clean the chicken and pat it dry with paper towels 🧻
Rub the chicken with olive oil, salt, pepper, and dried herbs 🫒🧂🌿
Place the chicken in a roasting pan 🍗
Cut the carrots, potatoes, onion, and garlic cloves into large pieces 🥕🥔🧅🧄
Arrange the vegetables around the chicken in the roasting pan 🥕🥔🧅🧄
Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables and season with salt, pepper, and dried herbs 🫒🧂🌿
Roast the chicken and vegetables in the oven for 60 minutes ⏰
Check the internal temperature of the chicken, it should reach 165°F 🍗
Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 10 minutes ⌛
Carve the chicken and serve it with the roasted vegetables 🍗🥕🥔🧅🧄
Enjoy your meal! Bon appétit! 😋🍽️
Öncelikle bir kaseye 2 adet yumurtayı kırın. 🥚
Üzerine bir tutam tuz, bir çay kaşığı tereyağı ve bir yemek kaşığı süt ekleyin. 🧂🧈🥛
Bir tutam karabiber ekleyin ve iyice çırpın. 🌶️
Bir tava üzerine tereyağı ekleyin ve eritin.
Yumurtalı karışımı tavaya dökün ve altın rengi olana kadar pişirin. 🍳
Eğer isterseniz rendelenmiş peyniri üzerine serpiştirin ve eriyene kadar kısık ateşte tutun. 🧀
Omleti tabağa alın ve sıcak servis yapın. 🔥
Afiyet olsun! Bon Appétit! 🍽️
Preheat the oven to 400°F. 🔥
In a shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, salt, and black pepper. Mix well. 🍞🧀🌿
In another shallow dish, beat the eggs. 🥚
Coat each chicken breast with flour, dip in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumb mixture. 🍗🥚🍞
In a frying pan, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Cook the chicken breasts until golden brown on both sides. 🍳🍗
Transfer the chicken breasts to a baking dish. Top each breast with marinara sauce and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. 🍅🧀
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly. ☑️🔥
Serve the Chicken Parmesan with pasta or salad. Enjoy your meal! 🍝🥗😊
Tavayı ocağa koyun ve ısıtın. 🔥
Yumurtaları bir kaseye kırın ve çırpın. ♻️
Tereyağını tavaya ekleyin ve eriyene kadar bekleyin. 🍳
Çırpılmış yumurtaları tavaya dökün. 🥚
Tuz ekleyin ve karıştırın. 🧂
İki taraflı pişirin, altını üstünü çevirerek kontrol edin. 🔃
Omleti tabağa alın ve sıcak servis yapın. 🍽️

Boil the pasta in a pot of salted water until al dente. :pot::water::salt:
Drain the cooked pasta in a colander. :colander:
In a pan, melt the butter over medium heat. :pan::butter:
Add the milk to the pan and bring it to a simmer. :pan::milk:
Stir in the cheese until it melts and the sauce becomes creamy. :cheese:
Season with salt and pepper to taste. :salt::pepper:
Add the cooked pasta to the pan and toss until it is well coated with the cheese sauce. :pan::spaghetti:
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes to heat the pasta through. :stove:
Serve hot and enjoy your meal! :plate::yum:
